verses.text: Ix lolon Dios t'a vinhaj Noé yet' t'a eb' yuninal vinh, ix yalani to ol yak' syaxil t'a yib'anh eb'. Ix yalan icha tik: Tzijtumocab' eyuninal tz'alji, b'ud'jocab' yol yib'anhk’inal tik yuj eb'.
Masanil nok' nok' ay t'a sat lu'um tik yet' nok' much yet' nok' ay t'a yol ha' mar ol xiv nok' t'ayex. Masanil juntzanh nok' tik skan nok' t'a yol e k'ab'.
Ha ticnaic syal e chi'an masanil nok' nok' tik. Ha in svak' nok' t'ayex icha ix aj vak'an anh itaj e chi'a.
Palta ay jun tas manh ol yal-laj e chi'ani, aton nok' chib'ej syuk' schiq'uil, yujto ha t'a schiq'uil nok' chi' ay sq'uinal.
Ha in ol in ch'olb'itej eb' anima smilancham junok yetanimail. Ha nok' nok' smilancham anima, ol miljocpaxcham nok'.
Ha mach smilancham yetanimail, anima pax ol milanchamoc, yujto a ex anima ex tik, icha onh tik, icha chi' ex cutej co b'oani.
Tzijtumocab' eyuninal tz'alji, b'ud'jocab'el yol yib'anhk’inal tik eyuuj, xchi Dios.
Ix yalanpax Dios t'a vinhaj Noé yet' t'a eb' yuninal icha tik:
Ha ticnaic, svak'kan jun in trato tik eyed'oc yet' masanil eb' eyinhtilal,
yet' masanil nok' nok' ix elta eyed'oc t'a yol te' barco tik: Nok' much, nok' molb'etzal nok', nok' k'ultaquil nok' yet' masanil nok' nok' ay t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik.

Ha jun in trato ol vak' eyed'oc tik, manhxo ol in q'uexa'. Manhxo ol in satel anima yet' nok' nok' yuj junok oval ha' mucvajum. Manhxo ol jax jun oval ha' mucvajum yic satxiel sat lu'um tik, icha jun ix ek' tik.
Aton yechel in trato tik svak'kan eyed'oc yet' masanil nok' nok' t'a masanil q'uinal.
Svak'och jun chacpan t'a cal asun, a jun chi', aton yechel in trato yet' yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
Ayic svak'ancot asun haxo scheclaj jun chacpan chi' t'a skal,
ata' tzin nacot in trato ix vak' eyed'oc yet' nok' nok', yuj chi' manhxo ol ex in satel yuj junok oval ha' mucvajum.
Ayic svilan jun chacpan chi', tzin naancoti to ay jun in trato ix vak' t'a junelnhej eyed'oc yet' masanil nok' nok' ay t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
Aton yechel in trato tik ix in b'o eyed'oc yet' jantac nok' nok', xchi Dios t'a vinhaj Noé chi'.
Ha eb' yuninal vinhaj Noé ix elta t'a yol te' barco yet'oc: Aton vinhaj Sem, vinhaj Cam yet' vinhaj Jafet. Ay jun yuninal vinhaj Cam chi' scuchan Canaán.
Ha eb' tik yuninal eb' vinhaj Noé, haxo t'a yinhtilal eb' ix pitzvielta jantac chonhab' ay t'a sat lu'um tik.
Ha vinhaj Noé ix munlaj vinh t'a sat lu'um. Ha te' uva ix sb'ab'laj avej vinh.
Ay jun k'u ix yuk' yal sat te' uva chi' vinh, ix q'ue t'a sjolom vinh, ix satel sk'ool vinh yuj. Ix squichel spichul vinh, ix kan pak'jab' vinh t'a yol smantiado.
Axo ix yilan vinhaj Cam, smam vinhaj Canaán to b'eranel vinhaj Noé chi', van stzetzan vinh smam vinh chi' ayic ix yalan vinh yab' eb' yuk'tac chi' schavanhil.

Ayic ix yab'an eb' yuk'tac vinh chi', ix yak'ancot jun k'apac sábana eb' t'a sjolom sjenhjab'. Ix b'eyb'at eb' t'a spatic, ix ochk'och eb' b'aj ay smam chi', ix spichan vinh eb' t'a k'apac sábana chi'. Ch'oc b'aj q'uelanb'at eb' yic wach' max yil snivanil smam eb' chi'.
Axo yic ix nachajxi sk'ol vinhaj Noé chi', ix yab'an vinh tas ix yutej sb'a vinhaj Cam chi', aton vinh schab'il yuninal.
Yuj chi' ix yalan vinh icha tik: Tzin catab'ejcan vinhaj Canaán. Checab' emnaquil ol ajkan vinh t'a eb' yuk'tac, xchi vinh.
Ix yalanxi vinh icha tik: Yak'ocab' svach'k'olal Jehová co Diosal t'a yib'anh vinhaj Sem, haxo vinhaj Canaán tz'ochcan schecab'oc vinh.
Nivanocab' tz'ajkan slum vinhaj Jafet yuj Dios. Cajnajocab' Dios t'a skal yinhtilal vinhaj Sem, haxo vinhaj Canaán tz'ochcan schecab'oc vinhaj Jafet chi', xchi vinh.
Ayic ix lajvi yek' jun oval ha' mucvajum chi', 350 ab'ilto ix ek' vinhaj Noé chi',
yuj chi' 950 ab'il sq'uinal vinh ayic ix cham vinh.
